overview.zh: Handshake是一条公链，专注于去中心化的域名注册、认证、交易和解析。采用了一种与DNS兼容的分散式，无权限的命名协议，其中每个对等方都在验证并负责管理根区域，目的是创建现有证书颁发机构的替代方案。
overview.en: Handshake is a decentralized, permissionless naming protocol compatible with DNS where every peer is validating and in charge of managing the root zone with the goal of creating an alternative to existing certificate authorities.
